message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of determining the topic of a set of images, which involves using visual information to retrieve similar images with text labels from a database and processing the associated tags using a word selection algorithm. This problem is related to computer vision (cs.CV) as well as information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the use of random walks and Conditional Random Fields (CRF) suggests a machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) perspective.
